scripts.check:spell: vale guidebook ecosystem services standard language tvm ton techniques contribute index.mdx README.md
scripts.check:spell:compact: npm run check:spell -- --output line | cut -d ':' -f 5 | sort -h | uniq
scripts.check:all: npm run check:openapi && npm run check:links && npm run check:redirects && npm run check:fs && npm run check:fmt && npm run check:spell
